```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## Scatterplot

```{r scatterplot}

# data()
# ?mpg
# mpg
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  geom_point()
```

### I need `color`!

```{r color}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)) +
  geom_point()
```

### `shape`: need a b&w figure

Changed 'color' to shape

```{r b&w}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy, shape = class)) +
  geom_point()
```

### `size` and  `color`

```{r scatter shape color}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = cty, y = hwy, size = class)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.2, color ="blue")
```

## Geoms

```{r geom_examples}

ggplot(mpg, aes(x=drv, y=hwy)) +
  geom_violin()

```


## Multiple geoms

```{r mult_geoms}

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=displ, y=hwy))


ggplot(data=mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()



```


## Customization

```{r mult_geoms}

ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=displ, y=hwy))


ggplot(data=mpg, aes(x=displ, y=hwy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title ="Relationship b/w engine size and mpg",
       x = "engine disp",
       y = "highway mpg") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 16))


```
